results.description: Chichester City, the lowest ranked team left in the FA Cup, will travel to League One opposition in the second round.

results.description: The FA Cup second round draw is to be conducted by Dion Dublin and Mark Bright, shown live on BBC Two on Monday, 11 November.

results.description: Watch highlights as League One sides Sunderland and Gillingham play out an FA Cup first-round draw at the Stadium of Light.

results.description: Sunderland and Gillingham must replay their first round tie after a howler by each goalkeeper results in a draw at the Stadium of Light.
results.title: Sunderland 1-1 Gillingham

results.description: Sunderland goalkeeper Jon McLaughlin doubles up as the ball boy against Gillingham as he has to retrieve the ball from an empty stand at the Stadium of Light.
results.shortTitle: When there are no ball boys available...
results.title: FA Cup: Sunderland goalkeeper Jon McLaughlin becomes ball boy against Gillingham

results.description: Sunderland goalkeeper Jon McLaughlin drops a free-kick from Gillingham's Olly Lee through his legs to level the score in their FA Cup first-round tie at the Stadium of Light.
results.shortTitle: Through his legs! Keeper error gifts Gillingham equaliser
results.title: FA Cup: Sunderland's Jon McLaughlin makes mistake v Gillingham

results.description: Relive all the action from Saturday's 26 FA Cup first-round ties, including Darlington grabbing a late equaliser at Walsall.

results.title: FA Cup first round latest after Sunderland draw with Gillingham

results.description: Striker Timmy Abraham - brother of Chelsea forward Tammy - is the hero for Fulham Under-21s in a 2-1 EFL Trophy victory at Wycombe.
results.shortTitle: Abraham nets for Fulham in EFL Trophy
results.title: EFL Trophy: Timmy Abraham nets for Fulham as brother Tammy scores Chelsea own goal

results.description: Luke O'Nien's first-half header earns Sunderland a League One win over a spirited Southend United.

results.description: Oxford United beat fellow League One side Sunderland on penalties to reach their first League Cup quarter-final since 1987-88.

results.description: Phil Parkinson wants to be the manager who "got Sunderland up and running again" after his appointment on Thursday.
results.title: Phil Parkinson: Sunderland name ex-Bolton Wanderers boss as manager

results.description: BBC Sport looks back at the moment Darren Bent scores for Sunderland with a deflection from a beach ball in a 1-0 win over Liverpool at the Stadium of Light.

results.description: Ten years on from Darren Bent's beach-ball goal for Sunderland against Liverpool, we pick out five things you may not know about one of the Premier League's most famous strikes.

results.description: League One side Sunderland are set to announce former Bolton Wanderers boss Phil Parkinson as their new manager on Thursday.

results.description: Sunderland are given permission to speak to Wycombe boss Gareth Ainsworth about the vacant manager's job.
